body:
I've just been handed an existing Radiance model and I'd like to
convert the geometry to some other format (DXF? OpenNURBS/Rhino?
SketchUp?) for study and perhaps editing. Are there any tools that do
that?
--
Randolph Fritz ? RFritz@lbl.gov
Environmental Energy Technologies Division ? Lawrence Berkeley Labs
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance Geometry Export
